name: WGJ65
description:
Theme: Watch your step.

Simple prototype wherein you try to dodge mines while tracking down some bandits making a getaway.

Mines will ping more frequently and more irritatingly as you get closer.

Barrels can be shot open and whiskey can be used to restore health.

CONTROLS:

  • SHOOT: Left and Right Mouse
  • MOVE: WASD
  • RELOAD : R
  • QUIT: F1
  • RESTART: F2
  • FULLSCREEN(AT YOUR OWN RISK): F4
